sentences.sContent: Such superiority or inferiority is the objective basis of initiative or passivity.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such superiority or inferiority is the objective basis of initiative or passivity.
sentences.sCn: 这种优势或劣势，是主动或被动的客观基矗。

sentences.sContent: These local successes will add up to strategic superiority and initiative for us and strategic inferiority and passivity for the enemy.
sentences.sContent_eng: These local successes will add up to strategic superiority and initiative for us and strategic inferiority and passivity for the enemy.
sentences.sCn: 把这些局部的东西集合起来，就成了我们的战略优势和战略主动，敌人的战略劣势和战略被动。

sentences.sContent: If we assume that our efforts are unrelated to the outcomes in our lives we develop an outlook of pessimism and passivity.
sentences.sContent_eng: If we assume that our efforts are unrelated to the outcomes in our lives we develop an outlook of pessimism and passivity.
sentences.sCn: 如果我们假设自己的付出与成果无关，那么我们就衍生出悲观和被动的观念。

words.tran: 被动的，消极的；被动语态的
